description:
Those in Rutherfordton and beyond know they can count on Price Petho & Associates when they have suffered injuries in an accident through no fault of their own. Committed to excellence, the law firm receives high praise from clients who have experienced personal attention, honesty and individualized strategies for fighting their cases related to motor vehicle accidents, work injuries, medical malpractice, premises liability, wrongful death and more.

In the 40 years they have served the people of North Carolina, the attorneys at the law firm have successfully recovered fair compensation for countless clients through personal injury and wrongful death cases. While many of these settled through negotiations, the firm is not intimidated by bullying or the schemes of insurance companies. They are always prepared to take your case to court and fight for what you deserve for your pain and suffering, and loss, including:

  • Present and future medical bills related to the accident
  • Lost income if you are unable to work because of your injuries
  • Damage to your property such as your vehicle
  • Recovery of money you spent for services such as house cleaning or dog walking
  • The value of the quality of life you have lost
  • Your pain and suffering
  • Punitive damages in some cases
  • Funeral expenses and other damages if you lost a loved one in the accident

The law firm of Price Petho & Associates never loses sight of the physical, emotional and financial struggles you may be dealing with, and they handle each case personally, never passing you off to an assistant. To learn more about how you may benefit from their experience and integrity, contact their Rutherfordton law office to schedule a free initial consultation. An attorney will meet with you either in person or virtually if you feel more comfortable in these uncertain times.
